name: Phantom of Zana
description:
Trouble has fallen upon King Joy. The Prince, his only heir, has been kidnapped. But that's not all, The Queen has also been transformed! The mysterious villain that is responsible for these nefarious acts was last seen heading into the wildlands of Zana. Play as Fantastic Fania and track down this elusive agent of chaos, rescue The Prince, save The Queen and save the day!

Gain new abilities and power ups along the way. Including but not limited to:

-A grappling hook.

-Special attacks and acrobatic skills.

-Healing Potions!

Conquer 13 levels. Among these are 2 top down shooter levels, because sometimes flying through the air with a jetpack is exactly what's needed.
